Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to an incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, and 25th due to, street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, and 25th due to, street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near Broadway/Catalpa
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB: Broadway, Berwyn. Sheridan, Lawrence and Broadway; NB: Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Broadway/Catalpa due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Broadway, Berwyn, Sheridan, Lawrence and Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Broadway, Lawrence, Sheridan, Foster and Broadway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem (O'Hare branch). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem (O'Hare branch)

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
